label: AB4C_tP24_129_bc_ij_d-001
title: CsFeF$_{4}$ II Structure
comments:
(Hidaka, 1986) identify two phase transitions in CsFeF$_{4}$: \begin{itemize} \item At high temperatures, CsFeF$_{4}$ I has the tetragonal \href{current_web_home_dir/AB4C_tP6_123_b_eg_c-001}{TlAlF$_{4}$ ($H0_{8}$) structure}. \item At 475K there is a second-order phase transition to CsFeF$_{4}$ II, tetragonal space group $P4/nmm$ \#129 (this structure). \item At 250K there is a second-order phase transition to CsFeF$_{4}$ III, orthorhombic space group $P2_{1}2_{1}2$ \#18, with the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB4C_oP24_59_c_efg_ab-001}{RbAlF$_{4}$ III structure}. \end{itemize} ~ \vspace{-.25in} 
 The different structures are distinguished by the tilt of the FeF$_{6}$ octahedra.
